level.text: Subject to ยง7501.2, a license issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at 12:00 midnight of January 31 of each odd-numbered year.

If the Director changes the renewal system pursuant to ยง4006.3 of Chapter 40 of this title, a license issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at 12:00 midnight of the last day of the month of the birth date of the holder of the license, or other date established by the Director.
